phrases: Want to come play at my place next time?
I have lots of games and snacks.
Plus we have our own maid, too!
You could bring your maid with you, as well.
You know, the one who joined us for dodgeball.
When I talked about that, our maid said she would love to meet her.
She wants to have a chance to discuss being a maid.
So it is okay, right, Kanna-san?
The reckless person who dares challenge me as a maid lives here?
Because you know a lot about maids.
Compared to me, all humans are practically babies.
Young lady, I believe introductions are due.
It is a pleasure to meet you.
I am Georgie, and I serve this family as their maid.
You do not seem to be dressed like much of a maid.
There is no black and white, for a start.
No, there actually is not a set uniform for maids in the first place.
As their role as servants grew larger over a long period of history,
their outfits evolved into what we know today.
This maid outfit is as one created with a young girl's
I am humbled by your discerning eye.
Miss Kobayashi, please do not be swayed by this strange maid!
I have heard the rumors about you in the shopping district.
I have wanted to discuss maids with you for a while.
Oh, but this is the first time Miss Kobayashi's pulled me along so purposefully.
Well, Kanna-san, do you want to play in my room?
Sure, let us give it a go.
So you follow the directions and place your hands and feet on the proper colors.
I want to play a video game.
I-I have plenty of video games.
I did manage to acquire some first flush Darjeeling.
It is a good, fresh tea, right?
Oh, this is an antique cup!
Is it from the Victorian era?
Yes, I picked it up from a flea market.
Georgie-san, what led you to like maids?
At first it was a picture book.
It was a story of a young lady becoming a maid...
They were professionals entrusted with the house!
Their pride and dignified figures moved my heart!
Changing clothes between morning and afternoon...
Always paying attention to their appearance even when busy with work!
Do you think I am getting along with the kids in our class?
You can do everything, and everyone praises you.
It feels different to me though.
but I want something like what Kobayashi and Tohru share.
I like you a lot, Kanna-san.
I want to be even closer to you.
Frankly, I would love to marry you.
Let us be even closer, okay?
YOU-Uh, um, I need to prepare my heart.
So Georgie-san is Saikawa-san's older sister, huh?
I guess she goes by the nickname Georgie when disguising herself as a maid.
So she was not a maid, but a maid fanatic.
What was Kanna-san about to do to me?
Hmm, it is raining a lot.
You decided to move from your world to ours?
Lately I have been hanging out with you more often,
and being here is a little more convenient, y'know?
I am living at someone else's house, just like Tohru.
Do you mind if I keep stopping by?
I do not mind, but are you sure?
I want to clear up the misunderstanding, too.
Actually, that is partly why I decided to live in this world...
It happened one day while I was on my way home from here.
Is someone performing a ritual nearby?
You let yourself be summoned by a ritual some kid did because they were curious?
And you agreed to be their servant?
Well, what is wrong with that?
It seems they are from a family line of mages.
So the misunderstanding you want to clear up is...?
They think I am a demon.
Do you think you could talk some sense into them?
No one's around at this hour.
I am using one of the rooms upstairs, so we can relax in there.
Tea's all I can offer you though.
First, there is something I would like to ask.
Well, I thought you were a dragon like Tohru, but...
Oh right, I did not tell you.
I guess I am what you would classify as an ex-goddess.
Her colleague served her cursed liquor, and then while she was drunk
Because of that, she was driven from her seat as goddess.
Then you might as well be a demon.
Well, I am still responsible for spreading civilization far and wide,
so it is hard to call myself a demon.
Which is why I prefer ex-goddess, feathered serpent, or Venusian.
Shouta, the one who summoned me.
He is always like that when I am home.
Well, when he is with an older woman whose body is an agitator of lust...
That is why I have tried sleeping with him and bathing with him to make him less nervous,
but none of it has worked.
A-A familiar cannot be acting on their own!
Are you planning to gather your allies and take over our home?!
Looks like he wants to appear strong.
I called these two here today to help you properly understand me.
I am not actually a demon.
But I used a demon summoning circle...
I thought it might be dangerous
if a fiendish demon appeared in that summoning circle,
so I answered the call first.
But it cannot be possible for me to summon a dragon with my magic power.
Y-You are just bluffing to make yourself seem more powerful, are not you?!
You will not fool me, demon!
It is like this every time.
Apparently you are from a family of mages, but why did you perform that summoning ritual?
Because I wanted to be accepted as a full-fledged mage.
In this world mages are living quiet lives, but one day we will return to our original world.
for the sake of that day, and worked hard to pass it down to me.
So I want to hurry up and...
Hmm, so you summoned Lucoa-san in order to prove your own power?
I kind of feel bad for Lucoa-san then.
Even if she were a demon,
it would cause trouble for her to be summoned when she was not needed.
you cannot take her with you to elementary school,
so there is no point in her staying in this home.
Is not this implying I should leave?
No, I do not want to go home!
But you cannot just stay here doing nothing, right?
Even I am working as a splendid maid to help Miss Kobayashi.
My mother handles all the housework.
In other words, you are saying I need to do something for Shouta in order to stay here?
How about more gold than you can ever use?
Do not need it, because Father can use alchemy.
I could teach you agricultural technology?
I do not want to be a farmer.
That would just because more problems if I had it now.
Then how about vast magical power?
Hmm, that is kind of appealing.
But I do not need it.
I do not think there is much point if you do not work hard to earn that for yourself.
Miss Lucoa, I do not think you will be much help to him.
Then this is all I have left...
You really are a demonic succubus!
Man, it is novel seeing Lucoa-san getting flustered.
At this rate she will be treated as a succubus for a while.
I have noticed something really bad about that house.
From what I could see, it was just an ordinary home.
I found out from the pictures of him, but...
I think he is my company's director.
Come on, I am not a demon.
Well, it is the rainy season.
Will something like that really make it clear up?
Guess I should head home, too.
Looks like you did not work overtime today.
I am happy you came home early!
I come home when I can.
Takiya-kun went home at the regular time, too.
I wonder if Takiya-kun and Fafnir-san are getting along well.
Now that you mention it, I have not seen him lately.
On the way home from school, in the park.
He was jumping in circles over and over,
That cursed dragon, what on earth is he doing?
You have improved a whole lot, Faf-kun!
Oh, you do not like it?
So, now you are all set for the call and respond part of tomorrow's event!
And I can obtain a limited edition item at that event, right?
You idiot, you cannot go that way!
I will not lose next time.
Fafnir-dono, there is a game I would like you to try playing for a bit.
The game you are selling at Comiket again?
I am at about the 80 mark.
Cannot you add anything to this part?
Ah, that part does need something, does not it?
Fafnir-dono, how many hours a day are you logged in?
What level are you at right now?
I have cleared all the limited time events, so I am free now.
You are on the fast-track to gaming addiction, huh?
Ooyama Takeshi: Do not talk to me, I will kill you.
Ooyama Takeshi: Do not talk to me, I will kill you.
Ebony Holy Knight: PK's impossible lolz
Ooyama Takeshi: Do not talk to me, I will kill you.
Ebony Holy Knight: PK's impossible lolz Crystalite: He is here almost all the time, is not he?
Ooyama Takeshi: Do not talk to me, I will kill you.
Ebony Holy Knight: PK's impossible lolz Crystalite: He is here almost all the time, is not he?
Crystalite: Hard to believe he is human!
Ooyama Takeshi: I told you, I am not human.
Ooyama Takeshi: I told you, I am not human.
Ooyama Takeshi: Do not group me with the rest of you.
Ooyama Takeshi: I told you, I am not human.
Ooyama Takeshi: Do not group me with the rest of you.
Ooyama Takeshi: I told you, I am not human.
Ooyama Takeshi: Do not group me with the rest of you.
Today I bought some hair conditioner on my way home from work.
And that will help with my hair?
This morning we have natto and rice.
This does not work that way.
Kanna's really happy about her new umbrella, huh?
Do not you know, Miss Kobayashi?
It is called sharing a lover's umbrella.
But you have your own umbrella, do not you?
Looks like they are getting along well.
I should not say this after recommending them for each other, but Mr. Takiya's incredible.
Being able to live with Mr. Fafnir.
Humans are either hits or misses.
The misses make themselves known quickly, but it takes time to know if you have found a hit.
And spending that much time on every person is bothersome.
As far as I am concerned,
the misses that trespass on my home to steal my treasure are better.
I cannot wait for the event, Faf-kuah!
The teruterubouzu are not working at all.
Lucoa, you are forbidden from approaching me naked from now on!
But my clothes are my scales, so I am always naked.
G-Get away from me you pervert!
